Text.Page:
A ring of bodyguards surrounds Orless at all times. They're tough stuff: {@LinkCreature:11#1011#Red Lash petty officers}, {@LinkCreature:11#2008#buccaneers}, and {@LinkCreature:11#4005#overseers}.

Deplete the bodyguard supply, and you make Orless vulnerable. And you simultaneously make sure there's no one to take over when Orless dies.

Bring back their tags. I have an idea...

That's a lot of tags! I'll pass these out to the ladsâ€”they'll get a kick out of it.

Well done, .
{@LinkCreature:11#1011#Red Lash petty officers}, {@LinkCreature:11#2008#buccaneers}, and {@LinkCreature:11#4005#overseers} guard the captain. Keep them from doing that...by killing them.
